name: angular-microfrontend-architecture
description: Angular 20 Microfrontend Architecture with Module Federation

scripts.build: pnpm run build:shell && pnpm run build:customers-mf
scripts.build:shell: cd shell && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.build:customers-mf: cd customers-mf && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd shell && pnpm install && cd ../customers-mf && pnpm install
